MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh, affecting properties in Victoria Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.50PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate the loss of power and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 3.15PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.12PM on 14th March 2021.
